an3.100:1.1: Yo → yo kho (sya-all, km); yo ca kho (mr)
an3.100:4.1: loṇakapallaṃ → loṇaphalaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | udakamallake → udakakapallake (mr)
an3.100:4.3: taṃ parittaṃ udakaṃ → udakamallake udakaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an3.100:4.12: loṇakapallena loṇo na assa apeyyo”ti → loṇaṃ nevassa appeyyoti (bj); loṇaphalena loṇo assa apeyyoti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
